original_text: The Lord spoke to Jeremiah in the fourth year that Jehoiakim ruled Judah as king. Jehoiakim was the son of King Josiah. It was also the first year that Nebuchadnezzar was king of Babylon. The Lord's message was about the people of Judah.
korean_text: 유다의 왕 요시야의 아들 여호야김 넷째 해 곧 바벨론의 왕 느부갓네살 원년에 유다의 모든 백성에 관한 말씀이 예레미야에게 임하니라

sentences.original_text: in the fourth year that Jehoiakim ruled Judah as king
sentences.korean_translation: 여호야킴이 유다 왕으로 다스린 넷째 해에

sentences.original_text: Jehoiakim was the son of King Josiah
It was also the first year that Nebuchadnezzar was king of Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 또한 느부갓네살이 바빌론 왕이 된 첫째 해였다

sentences.original_text: The Lord's message was about the people of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 메시지는 유다 백성에 관한 것이었다
